string.value: There are things to be done in order to tend Lazy Daisy's egg successfully. Let's go see the GM.
You must go find the GM every day from Monday through Friday, and receive the growth powder and apply it on the egg.
You receive the growth power for today. Hurry up and apply it on your chicken.
Hello, you must be taking care of Lazy Daisy's egg. Of course it's simply not enough to simply hunt and spread your energy.
You need one more thing. You have to apply this growth powder on your egg once a day... every day from Monday through Friday.
Tending an egg is not that easy, huh? Would you like to receive the growth power now?
Yes, you have to devote yourself to the egg. Oh, wait... can you come back? Hmm, where did I put the growth powder...
Hmm, you might need this growth powder. I guess you can do without.
Found it! Here it is. Please take this and apply it to your egg with love and care.
You have to apply it once a day. The effect will wear out after one day. Don't forget.
If you come back tomorrow, I'll give you the growth powder.
